messages: I have done it! I mined $BLOCK!
Wow! I can't believe I just mined some $BLOCK!!
Guess who just mined some fresh $BLOCK?
Knock knock. Who's there? $BLOCK. $BLOCK who? The $BLOCK that I just mined!
I just broke some $BLOCK, isn't that cool?
Everybody, EVERYBODY CALM DOWN! THE TIME IS $TIME.
If someone asked the time, it's $TIME.
I have done it! I picked up some $ITEM!
Wow, I just picked up some more $ITEM!!
Guess who just picked up some fresh $ITEM?
